content: AMENDMENT AND EXTENSION OF IRISH PEACE PROCESS CULTURAL AND TRAINING PROGRAM. The Irish Peace Process Cultural and Training Program Act of 1998 is amended to include new requirements for program participants entering the United States. Participants must be citizens of the United Kingdom or the Republic of Ireland, aged between 21 and 35, have resided in a designated county for at least 18 months, and have been unemployed for at least 12 months before departure.
